languages.text: "Я услышал вас. Видимо, вы неправильно меня поняли. Я имел в виду, что верные слуги Императора частенько обменивают на Футфоле боевые трофеи, взятые в битвах с тварями иных миров. Любые иные формы сношения с ксеносами мы, конечно, пресекаем без жалости".

traits.locale_text: "Я услышал вас. Видимо, вы неправильно меня поняли. Я имел в виду, что верные слуги Императора частенько обменивают на Футфоле боевые трофеи, взятые в битвах с тварями иных миров. Любые иные формы сношения с ксеносами мы, конечно, пресекаем без жалости".

languages.text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."
languages.original_text: "Я услышал вас. Видимо, вы неправильно меня поняли. Я имел в виду, что верные слуги Императора частенько обменивают на Футфоле боевые трофеи, взятые в битвах с тварями иных миров. Любые иные формы сношения с ксеносами мы, конечно, пресекаем без жалости".

traits.locale_text: "I've heard you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

"I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

languages.text: 「聞こえているよ。君は誤解している。私が言いたいのは、皇帝の忠実な家臣たちが、異世界の獣との戦いで獲得したものも含めて、戦利品をここフットフォールでよく交換するということだ。もちろん、他のやり方で異種族と交流すれば容赦なく追及しよう」
languages.original_text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「聞こえているよ。君は誤解している。私が言いたいのは、皇帝の忠実な家臣たちが、異世界の獣との戦いで獲得したものも含めて、戦利品をここフットフォールでよく交換するということだ。もちろん、他のやり方で異種族と交流すれば容赦なく追及しよう」

languages.text: “我明白您的意思，您肯定是误会了。我的意思是，帝皇忠诚的仆人经常会在落脚港交易他们的战利品，包括那些与异界怪物战斗时获得的战利品。当然，与异形一切其他形式的互动，都会被毫不留情地制止。”
languages.original_text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

traits.locale_text: “我明白您的意思，您肯定是误会了。我的意思是，帝皇忠诚的仆人经常会在落脚港交易他们的战利品，包括那些与异界怪物战斗时获得的战利品。当然，与异形一切其他形式的互动，都会被毫不留情地制止。”

languages.text: «Creo que ha habido un malentendido. Quería decir que los siervos más leales del Emperador suelen venir a Paso para vender los botines que tienen en su haber, como los que consiguen tras batallar contra bestias de otros mundos. Cualquier otra forma de interacción con los xenos es, por supuesto, perseguida sin piedad».
languages.original_text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que ha habido un malentendido. Quería decir que los siervos más leales del Emperador suelen venir a Paso para vender los botines que tienen en su haber, como los que consiguen tras batallar contra bestias de otros mundos. Cualquier otra forma de interacción con los xenos es, por supuesto, perseguida sin piedad».

languages.text: « En effet. Vous m'avez sans doute mal compris. Ce que j'entends par là, c'est que les fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur viennent souvent échanger leur butin à Castel, ce qui inclut parfois des objets obtenus à l'issue de combats les ayant opposés à des créatures originaires d'autres mondes. Toute autre forme d'interaction avec les xénos est bien entendu fermement condamnée. »
languages.original_text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Vous m'avez sans doute mal compris. Ce que j'entends par là, c'est que les fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur viennent souvent échanger leur butin à Castel, ce qui inclut parfois des objets obtenus à l'issue de combats les ayant opposés à des créatures originaires d'autres mondes. Toute autre forme d'interaction avec les xénos est bien entendu fermement condamnée. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. Aber Ihr habt mich missverstanden. Ich meinte, loyale Diener des Imperators bringen ihre Beute oft hierher nach Footfall, darunter auch die aus Gefechten mit außerweltlichen Bestien. Jeder andere Interaktion mit Xenos wird natürlich gnadenlos bestraft."
languages.original_text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. Aber Ihr habt mich missverstanden. Ich meinte, loyale Diener des Imperators bringen ihre Beute oft hierher nach Footfall, darunter auch die aus Gefechten mit außerweltlichen Bestien. Jeder andere Interaktion mit Xenos wird natürlich gnadenlos bestraft."

languages.text: "Pek tabii. Yanlış aksettim sanırım. Demek istediğim şu: İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârları, diğer dünyaların yaratıklarıyla yapılan savaşlarda ele geçirilenler de dâhil tüm ganimetlerini Binliman'da takas eder. Zenolar ile başka her türlü etkileşim şekilleriyse elbette merhametsizce cezalandırılır."
languages.original_text: "I hear you. You must have misunderstood. What I meant was, loyal servants of the Emperor often trade their spoils here on Footfall, including those claimed in battles with otherworldly beasts. Any other forms of interaction with xenos are, of course, persecuted without mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Pek tabii. Yanlış aksettim sanırım. Demek istediğim şu: İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârları, diğer dünyevi canavarlarla yapılan savaşlarda iddia edilenler de dâhil tüm ganimetlerini Binliman'da takas eder. Zenolar ile diğer herhangi bir etkileşim şekli elbette merhametsizce cezalandırılır."
